title: 日本ダービーの後に・前向きな言葉

text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon senses that Rice Shower will be an even stronger rival in the 'Kikuka Sho'. A declaration of war is made, and the audience erupts with excitement!
Meanwhile... Matikanetannhauser shows frustration at a press conference while expressing determination for the next 'Kikuka Sho'.
The positive words spoken at the conference touch the viewers' hearts. Matikanetannhauser has no intention of losing the next 'Kikuka Sho' either.
